description: taxonomic class of observed organism
taxonomic order of observed organism
taxonomic family of observed organism
genus name
full latin binomial name
latitude of occurrence record in decimal degrees
longitude of occurrence record in decimal degrees
date and time of observation in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format
day of the month of observation
month of observation
observation year
institution code provided by GBIF (www.gbif.org)
coordinate uncertainty in meters; NA indicate no information on coordinate uncertainty
type of record provided by GBIF; one of "HUMAN_OBSERVATION", "PRESERVED_SPECIMEN", "MATERIAL_SAMPLE", "MACHINE OBSERVATION"
number of individuals (if provided) observed for the sampling event
unique dataset key provided by GBIF
annual mean temperature (degrees Celsius, x10)
mean temperature of warmest quarter (degrees Celsius, x10)
mean temperature of coldest quarter (degrees Celsius, x10)
annual precipitation (millimeters (mm))
precipitation of wettest month (mm)
precipitation of driest month (mm)
precipitation seasonality (percent)
precipitation of wettest quarter (mm)
precipitation of driest quarter (mm)
precipitation of warmest quarter (mm)
precipitation of coldest quarter (mm)
annual mean diurnal range (degrees Celsius, x10)
isothermality (percent)
temperature seasonality (degrees Celsius, x100)
max temperature of warmest month (degrees Celsius, x10)
min temperature of coldest month (degrees Celsius, x10)
annual temperature range (degrees Celsius, x10)
mean temperature of wettest month (degrees Celsius, x10)
mean temperature of driest quarter (degrees Celsius, x10)

distance to the nearest major road (kilometers); road shapefile from the census bureau TIGER/Line shapefiles - prisecroad: https://www.census.gov/geographies/mapping-files/time-series/geo/tiger-line-file.html
elevation (meters); data from the National Elevation Dataset - Steven E. Hanser, 2008, Elevation in the Western United States (90 meter DEM): Wiley.
landcover classification from the University of Maryland (values 0-16); "NA" indicates no data; see MODIS product info for more details: https://doi.org/10.5067/MODIS/MCD12Q1.061
the mean normalized difference vegetation index (NDVI) aggregated over an entire year; see MODIS product info for more details: https://doi.org/10.5067/MODIS/MOD13A1.061

all bioX variables are from the WorldClim database downloaded with the raster package in R using the "getData" function at 2.5 minute resolution; Fick, S.E. and R.J. Hijmans, 2017. WorldClim 2: new 1km spatial resolution climate surfaces for global land areas. International Journal of Climatology 37 (12): 4302-4315.
